event_text: m_c was grabbed by a hawk, but luckily r_c saves them! The kit is still left injured from the ordeal.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred as a kit, when a hawk tried to carry them off.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from their wounds after a hawk tried to carry them off.

event_text: m_c snuck out of camp and returned cold and shivering, frostbite nipping at their paws.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died after they got frostbite sneaking out of camp.
